com.kontakt.sdk.ble.connection

Enum IBeaconCharacteristic

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<IBeaconCharacteristic>
      • com.kontakt.sdk.ble.connection.IBeaconCharacteristic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BluetoothDeviceCharacteristic.BeaconCharacteristic, Serializable, Comparable<IBeaconCharacteristic>

    public enum IBeaconCharacteristic
extends Enum<IBeaconCharacteristic>
implements BluetoothDeviceCharacteristic.BeaconCharacteristic
    IBeaconCharacteristic The Name enums depict specification given in kontakt.io Beacon specification - version 2.

    More precisely each Name enum describes characteristic with its name, Id, and order in service that it belongs to.

    See Also:
    kontakt.io Beacon specification - version 2.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      ADVERTISING_INTERVAL
      The ADVERTISING_INTERVAL characteristic provides access to beacon advertising interval.
      APPEARANCE
      The APPEARANCE characteristic provides appearance of Beacon device.
      BATTERY_LEVEL
      The BATTERY_LEVEL characteristic provides access to measured battery level described in percentage value.
      BOOTLOADER
      The BOOTLOADER characteristic allows to enable bootloader mode.
      DEFAULT_SETTINGS
      The DEFAULT_SETTINGS characteristic allows to restore default beacon settings.
      DEVICE_NAME
      The DEVICE_NAME characteristic provides Beacon name.
      DFU_CONTROL_POINT
      The DFU_CONTROL_POINT.
      DFU_PACKET
      The DFU_PACKET.
      FIRMWARE_REVISION_STRING
      The FIRMWARE_REVISION_STRING characteristic provides access firmware number.
      HARDWARE_REVISION_STRING
      The HARDWARE_REVISION_STRING characteristic provides access to Beacon's hardware number.
      MAJOR
      The MAJOR characteristic provides access to Beacon's Major value.
      MANUFACTURER_NAME_STRING
      The MANUFACTURER_NAME_STRING characteristic provides name of the manufacturer.
      MINOR
      The MINOR characteristic provides access to Beacon's Minor value.
      NON_CONNECTABLE_MODE
      The NON_CONNECTABLE_MODE characteristic allows to beacon's transition into non-connectable mode.
      PASSWORD
      The PASSWORD characteristic provides access to beacon password.
      PROPAGATED_DEVICE_NAME
      The PROPAGATED_DEVICE_NAME provides access to propagated beacon device name which is seen in an applications.
      PROXIMITY_UUID
      The PROXIMITY_UUID characteristic provides access to Beacon's proximity UUID.
      RESET
      The RESET characteristic allows to reset beacon.
      SERVICE_CHANGED
      The SERVICE_CHANGED.
      SET_PASSWORD
      The SET_PASSWORD characteristic provides access set beacon password during beacon authorization.
      SLAVE_PREFERRED_CONNECTION_PARAMETERS
      The SLAVE_PREFERRED_CONNECTION_PARAMETERS provides connection parameters in slave role.
      TX_POWER_LEVEL
      The TX_POWER_LEVEL characteristic provides access to Beacon's power level.

      • NON_CONNECTABLE_MODE

        public static final IBeaconCharacteristic NON_CONNECTABLE_MODE
        The NON_CONNECTABLE_MODE characteristic allows to beacon's transition into non-connectable mode. In this mode beacon is propagating advertising package for 20 minutes. Authorization with beacon is not possible. This characteristic is accessible from 2.6 firmware
